item.title: 旧金山的参事们周二正式向非裔美国人及其后代道歉，为该市在延续种族主义和歧视方面所扮演的角色道歉，其中几位参事表示，这只是对黑人居民赔偿的开始，而不是结束。
item.description:
Supervisors in San Francisco formally apologized Tuesday to African Americans and their descendants for the city’s role in perpetuating racism and discrimination, with several stating that this was just the start of reparations for Black residents and not the end. pic.twitter.com/2m4QW9P90W

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在加沙地带的拉法，一家拥挤不堪的医院里的婴儿正在共用保温箱。该市目前约有 140 万人，其中许多人是在以色列-哈马斯战争期间逃离的，当时地面攻势主要集中在加沙北部和中部。
item.description:
Babies in an overcrowded hospital were sharing incubators in Rafah in the Gaza Strip.

The city is now home to about 1.4 million people, many of whom fled the Israel-Hamas war when the ground offensive was concentrated on northern and central Gaza. pic.twitter.com/HmTz7T5oOG

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 普利策奖得主、美联社摄影师 Julio Cortez 将向您展示如何拍摄即将到来的日食。Julio 将分享拍摄日食的技巧和诀窍，随后还将进行问答。欲了解更多信息，包括如何注册：
item.description:
Pulitzer Prize-winning AP photographer Julio Cortez will show you how to capture the upcoming solar eclipse. Julio will share techniques and tips for capturing the eclipse followed by a Q&A session.

For more information, including how to register: https://t.co/O4JAXJvbeh

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 27, 2024
